tender.title: RC - Tender for Water, Wastewater and Ancillary Services for CBC
tender.description: CBC are currently out to tender for the provision of water, wastewater and ancillary services.Suppliers that would like to take part in this tender process are invited to Express Interest upon which the will be given access to the full tender documentation delivery through this e-tendering system.When the tender documents have been made available involved suppliers will receive notification via email and the tender documents can be accessed from the My Tenders area of this website and selecting the View Details button of this project.Expressions of interest will only be accepted until 14th October 2021 and the deadline for submissions of the tender will be 28th October 2021.Please allow sufficient time to make your return as late returns will not be permitted.Any questions relating to this tender should be made via correspondence on the website and can be addressed to the main contact as shown in the details above.

tender.title: The Provision of IT Hardware and Associated Services

classification.description: Office and computing machinery, equipment and supplies except furniture and software packages

tender.description: The Growth Company (GC) wishes to appoint a single framework provider for the provision of IT Hardware and Support Services.

lots.description:
The successful provider will have the ability to deliver fully imaged and configured good quality computer hardware and accessories direct to our internal customers.

The successful provider will collect equipment and repair and repurpose for new users or leavers of the organisation or to recycle equipment, supporting both home and office locations, including break fix services.

renewal.description: The contract period will be for an initial period of 2 years, with an option to extend for two further 12 month periods.

deliveryLocation.description: The head office is in Manchester and our site offices are predominately in the North West and Yorkshire
